DropdownButtonProps.name: block
DropdownButtonProps.description: Sets the button to be 100% of the width of its parent

DropdownButtonProps.name: icon
DropdownButtonProps.description:
string icons have been deprecated, please pass a component from `@procore/core-icons`
The icon to display on the left side of the label

DropdownButtonProps.name: iconRight
DropdownButtonProps.description: The icon to display on the right side of the label

DropdownButtonProps.name: open
DropdownButtonProps.description: Changes the direction of the arrow if shown

DropdownButtonProps.name: variant
DropdownButtonProps.description:
All variants except for primary, secondary, tertiary are DEPRECATED.
All will still be accepted, but deprecated ones will look like secondary

DropdownProps.name: footer
DropdownProps.description: Content to render in a footer.

DropdownProps.name: i18nScope
DropdownProps.description:
The i18n key to use for the dropdowns's configurable strings.
Defaults to using the core library's default strings.

DropdownProps.name: icon
DropdownProps.remarks: string icons have been deprecated, please pass a component from `@procore/core-icons`

DropdownProps.name: onSearch
DropdownProps.description: Adds a search bar to the dropdown.

DropdownProps.name: onSelect
DropdownProps.description:
Callback for selecting an item from the menu { '({ event: ReactEvent, item: Menu.Item.props.item, group: bool }) => void' }
item will be the item prop supplied to the{' '} Item component
